messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CHICAGO POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION DIVISION
Vice Squad
SIGNAL: 72V
ITEM NUMBER: V-72061-26
PAGE 25 of 63
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Aaron Stewart
Sgt. Nicole Harris
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Laura Wilson
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Peter Griffin
Sgt. Maria Rodriguez
( Undercover Operations Unit)
Det. James Carter
Det. Sandra Lopez
( Undercover Operations Unit)
Det. William Moore
( Undercover Operations Unit)
Det. Emily Johnson
Det. Robert Taylor
(General Assignment)
Det. Kevin Anderson
(Drug Enforcement Unit)
Det. Lisa White
(Special Investigations Unit)
VICTIM:
JANE DOE, female, age 28, local resident.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
10 OCTOBER 2026 at around 10:30 PM in the Wicker Park area.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Laura Wilson
4653
During the investigation, the team navigated through a maze of deceptive leads and altered digital records. Officer Martinez, on routine patrol in Wicker Park, was first to uncover evidence of vice activity. He was quickly supported by Sgt. Peter Griffin and Patrol Officer Kelly, who helped to establish a perimeter. Technician Brown, adept in digital data analysis, was tasked with sifting through the altered records. Criminalist Evans, analyzing the scene, found hidden compartments that were pivotal in revealing the operation's scale. Coroner Dr. Mitchell was later called to assess an individual found in the vicinity, leading to additional insights into the vice activities. Patrol Officer Thompson, working closely with the local community, gathered key testimonies that helped to unravel the network's operations.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Aaron Stewart Officer Context: Supervised the case in the Vice Squad. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Nicole Harris Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Stewart. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Laura Wilson Officer Context: Lead investigator for the vice case, reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Peter Griffin Officer Context: Assisted at the scene, part of the Undercover Operations Unit. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Maria Rodriguez Officer Context: Undercover Operations Unit sergeant, supported the operation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. James Carter Officer Context: Undercover Operations Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Sandra Lopez Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the Undercover Operations Unit. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. William Moore Officer Context: Undercover Operations Unit detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Emily Johnson Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Robert Taylor Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the vice case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Kevin Anderson Officer Context: Drug Enforcement Unit detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Lisa White Officer Context: Special Investigations Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Martinez Officer Context: First to uncover evidence of vice activity in Wicker Park. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Kelly Officer Context: Assisted in establishing a perimeter at the scene. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Brown Officer Context: Specialized in digital data analysis, worked on the altered records. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Evans Officer Context: Analyzed the scene, found hidden compartments linked to the operation. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Mitchell Officer Context: Assessed an individual, provided insights into the vice activities. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Thompson Officer Context: Collected testimonies from the local community, aiding the investigation. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
